column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Hey , we 're almost at the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You want me to be like you , or totally honest ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Are you saying I 'm a liar ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm saying you 're an optimist .
#Text=Same thing , basically .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , guys , look at this !
#Text=" Katara says : " They really are airbenders !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , they 're not .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What do you mean " they 're not " ?
#Text=Those guys are flying !
#Text=" Aang says : " Gliding maybe , but not flying .
#Text=You can tell by the way they move , they 're not airbending .
#Text=Those people have no spirit .
#Text=" Katara says : " I do n't know , Aang .
#Text=That kid seemed pretty spirited .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We better find some solid ground , before it finds us .
#Text=" Colonists says : " Go Teo !
#Text=Show that bald kid how it 's done !
#Text=" Teo says : " Hey there , you 're pretty good !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , I know .
#Text=But I can do more than fancy gliding .
#Text="
